title: Rimon Nabs Sports Recreation Litigator From Duane Morris
content:
,  6:47 PM ET) -- Rimon PC said Wednesday it has beefed up its California location with a former Duane Morris LLP partner who brings decades of litigation experience advising ski areas, golf course operators, mountain bike parks and cruise ship operators. 
Jill Haley Penwarden joined Rimon’s new Lake Tahoe office as a partner in its entertainment, sports and recreation practice, according to the firm. 

She said the firm has an excellent reputation as a place where litigators can expand their practices and work cooperatively with other high-level attorneys.
